trans-unit.source: Provides data for the <xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandManager.Executed> and <xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandManager.PreviewExecuted> routed events.
<xref:System.Windows.Input.ExecutedRoutedEventHandler> represents the method that implements the command logic of a <xref:System.Windows.Input.RoutedCommand>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Input.ExecutedRoutedEventHandler>rappresenta il metodo che implementa la logica di un <xref:System.Windows.Input.RoutedCommand>.</xref:System.Windows.Input.RoutedCommand></xref:System.Windows.Input.ExecutedRoutedEventHandler>

trans-unit.source: Separating the implementation logic from the command allows the command to be invoked from different sources and types and enables the centralization of command logic.
trans-unit.target: Separare la logica di implementazione del comando consente il comando per essere richiamati dai tipi e da diverse origini e consente di centralizzare della logica di comando.

trans-unit.source: This event data class is also used for <xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandManager.Executed?displayProperty=fullName> and <xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandManager.PreviewExecuted?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: Questa classe di dati di evento viene utilizzata anche per <xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandManager.Executed?displayProperty=fullName>e <xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandManager.PreviewExecuted?displayProperty=fullName>.</xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandManager.PreviewExecuted?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandManager.Executed?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: But most practical handlers will handle the <xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandBinding.Executed> events from a particular <xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandBinding>, rather than work at the <xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandManager> level.
trans-unit.target: Ma gestori più pratici gestirà la <xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandBinding.Executed>eventi da un particolare <xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandBinding>, anziché di lavorare con il <xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandManager>livello.</xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandManager> </xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandBinding> </xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandBinding.Executed>

trans-unit.source: For more information on commanding, see [Commanding Overview](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Per ulteriori informazioni sui comandi, vedere [panoramica dei comandi](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: Gets the command that was invoked.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene il comando che è stato richiamato.

trans-unit.source: The command associated with the event can be cast to the specific implementation of <xref:System.Windows.Input.ICommand>, such as a <xref:System.Windows.Input.RoutedCommand>, if the type is known.
trans-unit.target: Il comando associato all'evento può eseguire il cast all'implementazione specifica di <xref:System.Windows.Input.ICommand>, ad esempio un <xref:System.Windows.Input.RoutedCommand>, se il tipo è noto.</xref:System.Windows.Input.RoutedCommand> </xref:System.Windows.Input.ICommand>

trans-unit.source: The command associated with this event.
Gets data parameter of the command.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene il parametro di dati del comando.

trans-unit.source: This property represents a generic data parameter that is defined by the particular command.
trans-unit.target: Questa proprietà rappresenta un parametro generico di dati definito per il comando specifico.

trans-unit.source: If this parameter is not needed, `null` can be passed.
trans-unit.target: Se questo parametro non è necessaria, `null` può essere passato.

trans-unit.source: Normally, the Parameter is used to pass specific information to the command when it is executed.
trans-unit.target: In genere, il parametro viene utilizzato per passare informazioni specifiche per il comando quando viene eseguita.

trans-unit.source: The type of the data is defined by the command.
trans-unit.target: Il tipo di dati è definito dal comando.

trans-unit.source: The default value is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Il valore predefinito è <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>.
